website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for competitors and those looking to enhance performance through all gear.
pros: Designed with a second-skin fit to give full range of movement
Allows you to perform at your best without being restricted
We love that this wetsuit can be used for big competitions to improve one's performance
cons: May fit short in some sections

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tri suit and very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Used for my first olympic tri. Dry fast, comfortable, fits perfect, i am 6” 180 lbs went for L. In addition to that it’s ethically produced. Please make it in more colors. I’m buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Bakri

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit worried about the quality due to the price, but was surprised about how good a value it was. I pretty much used it for a Duathlon right out of the package and wasn't disappointed. I would prefer the zipper in front and would recommend to make it in flashier colors, but for the price it is a good deal. I'm 5'9 and 175lbs and the large fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great first Tri Suit
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my first sprint triathlon. It was perfect. As a swimmer who never wore a full body suit I was afraid it would bug me in the water, it did not. When running / biking I was afraid I'd get too warm with only the back side zipper. Our air temps were low 70's and I did not overheat. I'll wear it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M Tarquini

customer_reviews.title: Great product, using it for quite some time now
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my regular Triathlon practice and have been in the ocean as well as the pool with this. Fit very good and is a great product. Would recommend this product to others. The price is very reasonable. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: vrdumbos

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction at leg grippers
customer_reviews.text: Material and fit are great for the money I guess. Could love it except ... Where the leg grippers are running I get an alergic looking reaction, red, itchy, swollen rings, biking, pool, or lake, doesn't matter. I'm not allergic to anything as far as I know otherwise. Just my personal experience and a word of caution.
customer_reviews.author: sharp pencil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first triathlon outfit and was perfect for my first triathlon. Good quality, good material and fit. Quick drying material amd no shaffing of skin during the competition. I wish they had more colors and I would purchase a second one. Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Smak

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tri-suit. It drys quickly after a swim, has ample padding for the ride and fits comfortably for the run. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. It exceeded my expectations. I thought for the price it would be cheaply made but I found it to be made as well, maybe better, then the other suits I tried for double or triple the price. You can’t go wrong with this suit.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. McNamee

customer_reviews.title: ... for a triathlon he did Saturday and it worked great! He said it was very comfortable the entire ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this for a triathlon he did Saturday and it worked great! He said it was very comfortable the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Granacher

customer_reviews.title: Great suit but material can irritate.
customer_reviews.text: The suit fit well, but the welts on the material under my armpit.rubbed me raw during competition. I'm not sure why this happened, but I am still nursing the large chafed marks by my biceps. The padding is very good for long rides. I was surprised. Legs fit just right. I was sorry that it chafed me so badly. I wasn't bothered by the zipper in the back...just have to get used to it. Maybe the arm holes need to be cut lower?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lange

customer_reviews.title: Zipper poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: Zipper never worked right. It broke off the third time I wore it. One time was a test run. The other two were sprint triathlons. It would have been within the return window by a few days but I didn’t realize I only had 30 days to do returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Sundried
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from Sundried and I continue to love their products. The suit fits great and is super comfortable. - ready for the Tri season to start! I like their ethical fabrication and sourcing also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It held up great. I am on the larger side and the top was a little tight, but it made it through my first triathlon. Only thing is I wish it had a front zipper to be able to open it and let a bit of air in.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome. I was worried about the padding being a bother while running and I never once even thought about it on the run of my first sprint Tri that I wore this in. Great product for someone who enjoys doing a couple sprints or olympics a year, wants comfort, and isn’t insanely competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: OK comfort zipper died quickly
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after 3 uses in 90 days. Contacted the company who said they would exchange but directed me back to the Amazon link that said outside return period. Gave up wrote it off to experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Zipper in back fell down at some point int he Triathlon. Not as stretchy as I would like. No pockets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a tri suit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised. I’ve worn it twice so far (testing it in the pool, bike, and run before my race and once for an Olympic distance triathlon). It worked great and was very comfortable. It’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Willy K

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off, but good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off a bit. Had to return my original order and go up a size. If you want a snug fit, then follow the size guide. If you want a little room, go up a size. The material is real thin, but good to have a light outfit for all three legs of a triathlon. Not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST AS DESCRIBED!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the trisut yet, but it seems of very good quality, a great price/value and is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: ROR

customer_reviews.title: Like skin!
customer_reviews.text: Easy fit, zipper slides easy, fits like skin! Not made for a tough Mudder like some Zoot products, but for a Triathlon under the wetsuit and after the swim it will be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kutzner

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is low quality. Broke immediately. Thats all that needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, not the greatest looking pattern
customer_reviews.text: it will work, the whites side look strange in person
customer_reviews.author: 300BLK

customer_reviews.title: This is a one piece suit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great suit. Just beware that it is a singlet. I bought it without realizing that, which I did not prefer. However, it was comfortable and still served its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Carron

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Good value racing suite. Good padding for bike, but not too much padding.
customer_reviews.author: jim nahra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and was easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suit! Loved
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lightweight suit! My husband did his first Tri in it today and loved it. I plan on buying another as backup because when you find something that is fantastic always buy it in duplicate.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Horstemeier

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit for my first triathlon. It was the best value by far and worked great. I felt like I fit right in with the other more experienced racers that spent a lot more money on their suits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the logos on the side but plain on the front
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lagattuta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & product
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time last Sunday for my first tri ever. No chaffage, comfortable, and was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Darling

customer_reviews.title: It was great for running as well as biking
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for my first Duathlon , I am 5'4" and XS was correct fitting for me . It was great for running as well as biking . very comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: spr

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. It fits pretty well and it is easy to move in. It really came in handy for my last triathlon!!! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A good value with high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my first triathlon and I was not disappointed. It was very comfortable for all 3 events. I was concerned about riding in it after swimming but the pad and material was fast drying. I had no sore areas or chafing. The material is thinnnet than I expected ( I am used to heavier bike shorts) but was right for the tri. The price was right compared to others I looked at as well
customer_reviews.author: Jeff U

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Wore this in my first triathlon this week for all three events and had no issues whatsoever with it. Would recommend, and the padding did not create any swim issues.
customer_reviews.author: DY3

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: fits a little tight but makes me swim pretty streamline
customer_reviews.author: Ali H. Jaffery

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Wrong fit, poor quality. Do NOT buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: First triathlon.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit were perfect. Suit had a front chest zipper, eady getting on.
customer_reviews.author: brenda dan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nice design
customer_reviews.text: I loved not only the design but the quality and quick drying material as well
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Molenaar

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Suit was a very comfortable fit. Surprisingly pad was enough for bike ride
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Bustos

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: nice design and great materials. I can't believe that this suit is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: sunghyuk bae

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not only has a bad quality lycra, but also doesn't have back pockets (I didn't see it in the description). No recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase, Just need More colors!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 ft 180 lb with a 32 waist and a Large did the job for me. I took it for a swim and a run this suit was amazing. Excellent texture, weight, and it dries incredibly fast. I also tried it underneath my wetsuit and you feel like you are not wearing anything. I highly recommend this suit for beginners and intermediate triathletes alike. One complaint, they need to make these in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Enrico Maríno

product_meta.title: Sundried Mens Premium Padded Triathlon Tri Suit Compression Duathlon Running Swimming Cycling Skin Suit
product_meta.description:
Sundried is a premium ethical activewear brand with products designed by athletes for athletes. We use the latest technology in our designs so that our sports apparel keeps up with you no matter what the workout.

Our speciality is triathlon. We've got you covered whether it's your first ever race or you're a seasoned competitor. Our technical kit has everything you expect from a superior triathlon suit and is trialled and tested by world-class athletes all over the globe.

Sundried's premium triathlon suit is designed to provide exceptional performance for all levels of triathlete. Specifically designed for swimming, cycling, and running, the suit fits like a second skin to keep you dynamic and to prevent chafing throughout the race. Our fabric is fast-drying and chlorine-resistant with subtle padding providing comfort and shock absorption on your ride without causing irritation on the run.

The Sundried tri-suit is designed with a second-skin fit to give full range of movement and allow you to perform at your best without being restricted. The sleeveless design allows for total freedom of movement on the swim so you can get on with racing without worrying about your kit holding you back.
Our technical materials are super fast-drying to prevent chafing after the swim with a long-length zipper to the back for comfortable breathing and easy removal.
The triathlon suit features a subtle hypoallergenic pad to provide comfort on the ride but you won’t even notice it on the run so that you can get on with your race.
Intelligently designed leg grippers mean the legs won’t ride up while you run and prevent irritation throughout the entire race.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :14.17 x 11.02 x 0.79 inches; 7.94 Ounces
 * Item model number :Professional Trisuit
 * Date First Available :September 21, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Sundried
 * ASIN :B06VSG3TNQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #132,166 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #17696 inSports & Fitness Clothing 
    *  #46 inTriathlon Equipment 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars260 ratings

feature_bullets: MSRP $120. The Sundried tri-suit is designed with a second-skin fit to give full range of movement and allow you to perform at your best without being restricted. The sleeveless design allows for total freedom of movement on the swim so you can get on with racing without worrying about your kit holding you back.

Featured in 220 Triathlon and used by professional triathletes. Our technical materials are super fast-drying to prevent chafing after the swim with a long-length zipper to the back for comfortable breathing and easy removal.
The triathlon suit features a subtle hypoallergenic pad to provide comfort on the ride but you won’t even notice it on the run so that you can get on with your race.
Intelligently designed leg grippers mean the legs won’t ride up while you run and prevent irritation throughout the entire race.

Sundried cares about its customers as much as its racing gear. We guarantee total satisfaction, but if you experience any sort of problem whatsoever with your order, we will be in contact the whole way to find a speedy solution.
